meanings.definition: The act of perceiving the flavor of something by taking it into the mouth and allowing the taste buds to react to it.
meanings.sent1: During the tasting, I could identify the sweet and sour flavors of the fruit.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the tasting of the different cheeses at the event.
meanings.sent3: The tasting of the spicy sauce left him reaching for a glass of water.
meanings.sent4: Her tasting of success was like savoring a delicious meal after hard work.
meanings.sent5: The tasting of the exotic dish was a delightful adventure for her taste buds.

meanings.sent1: His tasting was so sensitive that he could distinguish various herbs in the dish.
meanings.sent2: The chef's tasting was impeccable, ensuring every dish was perfectly seasoned.
meanings.sent3: The cat's tasting of the fish made it clear that it was fresh from the ocean.
meanings.sent4: The tasting of nostalgia in the dish brought back memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: Her tasting of the soup revealed a blend of comforting flavors.

meanings.definition: The act of experiencing or undergoing something.
meanings.sent1: The tasting of failure motivated him to work harder next time.
meanings.sent2: Her tasting of success was a result of dedication and perseverance.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected tasting of adventure in her mundane routine brought excitement.
meanings.sent4: His tasting of disappointment in the project made him rethink his approach.
meanings.sent5: The tasting of joy in her heart was evident in her bright smile.
